name: Mitra
subtitle: The Silver Battle Wolf
description: He is also called the Song of Silver Madness. A tactless man to the point of surprise, without any sense of responsibility. However, once the battle begins, he becomes an untouchable Silver Wolf, churning the battlefield into a zone of carnage.
story: Known to some as the Song of the Silver Madness, he is incredibly insincere in everything he does. He shows absolutely no sense of responsibility in regard to those around him. Once he engages in a combat, though, he turns into an untouchable silver wolf that storms across the battlefield. Nothing is known about his past. One thing is certain: he does not distinguish between friend and foe once the madness of battle takes over him. Staying near him when he's in this state may be far more dangerous than holding onto a ticking time bomb.
like: Battle, exciting fights, the smell of gunpowder

inn.idle: Haah....I just wanna go take a nap.

talk: Hey, did a fight happen somewhere?
Bleh, I don't wanna do anything right now.
Sometimes, I just wanna let loose.

affinity.greet: Oh, it's a great day for shooting.
talk: Things were good back then. That old guy may be strict, but he sure takes good care of his men. So when he left the army... I quit, too! Hahaha!
Oh, I wonder what the old man is doing.
These guns of mine make me feel good. They're also kind of messed up...like me!
Kahaha! You know, these bastards whisper to me sometimes, eh. Pull the trigger, pull it, pull it~!!! Or so they say~
There's apparently a scary bounty hunter and former Imperial Navy on your tail. What does that feel like, eh? Hehehe...

uw.story: A pair of magical weapons that absorb the bloodlust of their user to enhance their own firepower. Each pull of their triggers pushes the user deeper and deeper into the craze of the battle. It is said that when a master craftsman creates a weapon, it develops a soul. Berkinos seem to have the soul of the war god. According to the story, when their creator pulled their triggers for the first time, he suddenly turned pale with terror and threw them into a river.

ut.story: Velkinoth's speedloader that's custom-made for faster reload. Hot-tempered Mitra used to complain that he wanted to shoot his enemies faster with Velkinoth's crazy rate of fire, but its slow reload speed kept getting in the way. One day, when Mitra was complaining as he always had been, Crow suddenly appeared in front of him. - Oh? Old... Kugh! Crow punched Mitra in the stomach, threw something at him, then went away. - Use that and stop complaining. Is this just his unique way of showing he cares?
